title: Area of region b/w two curves

content.question: The area of the region enclosed by the graphs of <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mi>y</mi> <mo>=</mo> <msup> <mi>x</mi> <mn>2</mn> </msup> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3D24@</annotation> </semantics> </math> and y=x is

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x
